DOC.brief_summary: The goal of this project is to evaluate the applicability of non-invasive optical imaging for the measurement of brain function during investigation of the lower urinary tract.
DOC.brief_title: Brain Imaging Plus Urodynamics to Investigate the Brain's Control of the Bladder
